review: I received this as a gift and found it very easy to set up. Prior to receiving it, I used my SurfacePro attached to my TV to run online content, and prior to that, a VCR that was a bit clumsy. The Amazon Fire TV provides easy access to shows I've "saved" through my computer on the Amazon Prime and Netflix sites.I have not yet figured out how to run HBO and its several related channels even though I subscribe to it through Verizon. That said, I usually save HBO specials through my DVR, so this is not an issue.In terms of streaming movies, I wish that Amazon and Netflix would run more up-to-date content. Amazon allows us to buy movies that are more recent (like going to a show and paying for a ticket). At this point, I've noticed a difference in price for one-time-viewing and "buying" the movie and I think that buying it means that the movie can be replayed anytime after "on demand." If that is a feature you'd like, check it out.
